data.name: Dreg Cannon
data.detailed_description:
Dreg Cannon is an action / adventure game set in the near future where Kyle works as a scavenger collecting items for his uncle. Equipped with a weapon forged from the greatest mind of all time follow him through his conquest to seek revenge against an evil warlord and stop his lieutenants from destroying the city.

Charge forward with this non-stop action paced game filled with exploration, puzzles, collectables, and plenty of combat.
Customize your character to the way you play with a full character forge system.
Customize abilities and upgrades for you and your weapons.
Compete with your friends with Steam leaderboards.
Plays great with the Steam Deck.

Dreg Cannon is available in English, Spanish and French coming soon.
